title: #445 My Daddy Was A Mobster with Anthony DeVito
itunes:title: My Daddy Was A Mobster with Anthony DeVito
description:
I talked to Comedian Anthony Devito about finding out his dad was a made guy in the mob before they found him shot many times in the trunk of a car. Also about coming to terms with his dad's violent lifestyle and how to articulate it on stage at his solo show this November 13th and Union Hall.

Follow Anthony!

instagram

Twitter

See his Solo show and more!

11/12 | Orlando

01/14 | Cleveland

And now 03/06 Salt Lake City! Tickets on sale Wednesday
